name: Bronzong
author: Daisuke Ito
flavor_text: One caused a news sensation when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2,000-year sleep.

poke_power.name: Miracle Oracle
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card. Then, discard a card from your hand. If you discard an Energy card, draw 1 more card. This power can’t be used if Bronzong is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Shady Stamp
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
